text: Lucie Koudelová (born 6 July 1994) is a Czech athlete specialising in the sprint hurdles. She represented her country at two outdoor and one indoor European Championships. She has personal bests of 13.12 seconds in the 100 metres hurdles (+1.9 m/s, Tábor 2016) and 8.20 seconds in the 60 metres hurdles (Prague 2015). ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing the |- |rowspan=2|2011 |World Youth Championships |Lille, France |11th (sf) |100 m hurdles (76.2 cm) |14.07 |- |European Youth Olympic Festival |Trabzon, Turkey |11th (h) |100 m hurdles (76.2 cm) |13.96 |- |2013 |European Junior Championships |Rieti, Italy |18th (h) |100 m hurdles |13.95 |- |2014 |European Championships |Zürich, Switzerland | – |100 m hurdles |DNF |- |rowspan=3|2015 |European Indoor Championships |Prague, Czech Republic |22nd (h) |60 m hurdles |8.22 |- |rowspan=2|European U23 Championships |rowspan=2|Tallinn, Estonia |7th (sf) |100 m hurdles |13.26 |- |6th |4 × 100 m relay |44.91 |- |2016 |European Championships |Amsterdam, Netherlands |20th (h) |100 m hurdles |13.41 |- |rowspan=2|2019 |rowspan=2|Universiade |rowspan=2|Naples, Italy |13th (sf) |100 m hurdles |13.64 |- |7th |4 × 100 m relay |45.83 |} ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Czech female hurdlers Category:People from Uherské Hradiště Category:Czech Athletics Championships winners Category:Competitors at the 2019 Summer Universiade
title: Lucie Koudelová
